pip install zipfile36

from azure.storage.blob import BlobServiceClient, BlobClient, ContainerClient
import requests
import pandas as pd
import zipfile
import io
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

sas_token = f'sp=racwdlm&st=2023-04-22T21:20:01Z&se=2023-05-31T05:20:01Z&spr=https&sv=2021-12-02&sr=c&sig=7Hb04rR6uzijvOjHdc70Xt9vyt4iEPx5i3AnoE20f%2Fg%3D'
account = 'https://sqlday2023.blob.core.windows.net'
url_base = 'http://data.gdeltproject.org/events/'
container = 'data'
unizpped_container = 'data/unizpped'
file_extension = 'csv'

def get_blob_service_client_sas( account, sas_token):
    account_url = account
    credential = sas_token
    blob_service_client = BlobServiceClient(account_url, credential=credential)

    return blob_service_client

def send_data_to_blob (container_client: ContainerClient, fileName:str):
    url = url_base+fileName


    print (f'url: {url}')

    file = fileName.split('.')[0]
    file_to_save = file +'.'+file_extension

    r = requests.get(url, allow_redirects=True)
    zipDocument = zipfile.ZipFile(io.BytesIO(r.content))  
    
    listOfFileNames = zipDocument.namelist()

    for file in listOfFileNames:
        tmp = zipDocument.extract(file)
        print (f'file: {file}, p={tmp}')

        f = open (tmp,"r")
        content = f.read()

        blob_client = container_client.upload_blob(name=file, data=content, overwrite=True, blob_type="BlockBlob")

def upload_last_X_days(blob_service_client: BlobServiceClient, container_name: str, days: int):
    end_date = (datetime.today() - timedelta(days=1)).strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
    start_date = (datetime.today() - timedelta(days=days)).strftime("%Y-%m-%d")

    upload_blob_file_for_dates(blob_service_client, container_name,start_date,end_date )
bsc = get_blob_service_client_sas(account,sas_token)
upload_blob_file_for_dates(bsc,unizpped_container, '2023-04-20','2023-04-29')
upload_last_X_days(bsc,unizpped_container,7)

from dataclasses import dataclass
from notebookutils import mssparkutils

@dataclass
class configuration_parameters_raw_bronze:
    DATALAKE: str
    RAW_CONTAINER: str
    BRONZE_CONTAINER: str
    RAW_SASKEY: str
    BRONZE_SASKEY: str

PARAMETERS = configuration_parameters_raw_bronze (
DATALAKE="https://sqlday2023.blob.core.windows.net",
RAW_CONTAINER="raw",
BRONZE_CONTAINER="bronze",
RAW_SASKEY=mssparkutils.credentials.getSecret('sqlday2023akv','SQLDayRaw','SQLDay_AKV'),
BRONZE_SASKEY=mssparkutils.credentials.getSecret('sqlday2023akv','SQLDayBronze','SQLDay_AKV')

from azure.storage.blob import BlobServiceClient, BlobClient, ContainerClient
import requests
import pandas as pd
import zipfile
import io
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

from notebookutils import mssparkutils
%run "03 Azure Storage/configuration/configuration_parameters_local_akv"
def get_configuration():
return PARAMETERS.DATALAKE, PARAMETERS.SASKEY, PARAMETERS.CONTAINER, PARAMETERS.URL

def get_blob_service_client_sas( account: str, sas_token: str) -> BlobServiceClient:
    account_url = account
    credential = sas_token
    blob_service_client = BlobServiceClient(account_url, credential=credential)

    return blob_service_client

def _send_data_to_blob (container_client: ContainerClient, fileName:str):
    url = url_base+fileName


    print (f'url: {url}')

    file = fileName.split('.')[0]
    file_to_save = file +'.'+file_extension

    r = requests.get(url, allow_redirects=True)
    zipDocument = zipfile.ZipFile(io.BytesIO(r.content))  
    
    listOfFileNames = zipDocument.namelist()

    for file in listOfFileNames:
        tmp = zipDocument.extract(file)
        print (f'file: {file}, p={tmp}')

        f = open (tmp,"r")
        content = f.read()

        blob_client = container_client.upload_blob(name=file, data=content, overwrite=True, blob_type="BlockBlob")

def upload_last_X_days(blob_service_client: BlobServiceClient, container_name: str, days: int):
    
    end_date = (datetime.today() - timedelta(days=1)).strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
    start_date = (datetime.today() - timedelta(days=days)).strftime("%Y-%m-%d")

    upload_blob_file_for_dates(blob_service_client, container_name,start_date,end_date )

account ,sas_token, container, url_base = get_configuration()

file_extension = 'csv'
bsc = get_blob_service_client_sas(account,sas_token)
upload_last_X_days(bsc,container,7)

from azure.storage.blob import BlobServiceClient, BlobClient, ContainerClient
import requests
import os
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

from notebookutils import mssparkutils
%run "03 Azure Storage/configuration/configuration_parameters"
def _get_configuration():
return PARAMETERS.SRC_DATALAKE, PARAMETERS.SRC_CONTAINER, PARAMETERS.SRC_SASKEY, PARAMETERS.RAW_DATALAKE, PARAMETERS.RAW_CONTAINER, PARAMETERS.RAW_SASKEY

def _get_blob_service_client( account: str, sas_token: str) -> BlobServiceClient:
    account_url = account
    credential = sas_token
    blob_service_client = BlobServiceClient(account_url, credential=credential)

    return blob_service_client

def _prepare_paths_for_data_processing (src_account: str,raw_account: str, src_container: str, raw_container: str, folder: str, file_name: str):

    src_account_for_abfss = src_account.split('://')[-1].replace("blob","dfs")
    raw_account_for_abfss = raw_account.split('://')[-1].replace("blob","dfs")
        
    path_to_blob_src = "abfss://" + src_container + "@" + src_account_for_abfss+"/"+ folder +"/"+file_name
    path_to_blob_raw = "abfss://" + raw_container + "@" + raw_account_for_abfss+"/"+ folder

    return src_account_for_abfss, raw_account_for_abfss, path_to_blob_src, path_to_blob_raw
src_account, src_container, src_sas_token, raw_account, raw_container, raw_sas_token = _get_configuration()
source_bsc = _get_blob_service_client (src_account, src_container)
raw_bsc = _get_blob_service_client (raw_account, raw_container)

folder = "Logfiles"
full_path_src = src_account + "/" + src_container 
full_path_raw = raw_account + "/" + raw_container + "/" + folder

src_container_client = _get_container_client(source_bsc, full_path_src, src_sas_token)

raw_container_client = _get_container_client(raw_bsc,full_path_raw, raw_sas_token )

blob_list = src_container_client.list_blobs(name_starts_with=folder) 


for item in blob_list:
    blob = os.path.basename(item.name )


    src_account_for_abfss, raw_account_for_abfss, path_to_blob_src, path_to_blob_raw = _prepare_paths_for_data_processing(src_account,raw_account ,src_container, raw_container, folder, blob)
    if 'json' in path_to_blob_src:
        print (path_to_blob_src)        
        df = spark.read.json(path_to_blob_src)
        df.write.mode("append").json(path_to_blob_raw)

from azure.storage.blob import BlobServiceClient, BlobClient, ContainerClient
import requests
import pandas as pd
import zipfile
import io
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

from notebookutils import mssparkutils
%run "03 Azure Storage/configuration/configuration_parameters_local"
def get_configuration():
return PARAMETERS.DATALAKE, PARAMETERS.SASKEY, PARAMETERS.CONTAINER, PARAMETERS.URL

def get_blob_service_client_sas( account: str, sas_token: str) -> BlobServiceClient:
    account_url = account
    credential = sas_token
    blob_service_client = BlobServiceClient(account_url, credential=credential)

    return blob_service_client

def _send_data_to_blob (container_client: ContainerClient, fileName:str):
    url = url_base+fileName


    print (f'url: {url}')

    file = fileName.split('.')[0]
    file_to_save = file +'.'+file_extension

    r = requests.get(url, allow_redirects=True)
    zipDocument = zipfile.ZipFile(io.BytesIO(r.content))  
    
    listOfFileNames = zipDocument.namelist()

    for file in listOfFileNames:
        tmp = zipDocument.extract(file)
        print (f'file: {file}, p={tmp}')

        f = open (tmp,"r")
        content = f.read()

        blob_client = container_client.upload_blob(name=file, data=content, overwrite=True, blob_type="BlockBlob")

def upload_last_X_days(blob_service_client: BlobServiceClient, container_name: str, days: int):
    
    end_date = (datetime.today() - timedelta(days=1)).strftime("%Y-%m-%d")
    start_date = (datetime.today() - timedelta(days=days)).strftime("%Y-%m-%d")

    upload_blob_file_for_dates(blob_service_client, container_name,start_date,end_date )

account ,sas_token, container, url_base = get_configuration()

file_extension = 'csv'
bsc = get_blob_service_client_sas(account,sas_token)
upload_last_X_days(bsc,container,7)

from azure.storage.blob import BlobServiceClient, BlobClient, ContainerClient
import os
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
%run utils/configuration/configuration_paramaters_raw_bronze

def get_configuration():
    return PARAMETERS.DATALAKE, PARAMETERS.RAW_CONTAINER, PARAMETERS.BRONZE_CONTAINER, PARAMETERS.RAW_SASKEY, PARAMETERS.BRONZE_SASKEY

def get_blob_service_client_sas( account: str, sas_token: str) -> BlobServiceClient:
    account_url = account
    credential = sas_token
    blob_service_client = BlobServiceClient(account_url, credential=credential)

    return blob_service_client
account , raw_container, bronze_container, raw_sas_token, bronze_sas_token = get_configuration()
account , raw_container, bronze_container, raw_sas_token, bronze_sas_token
raw_bsc = get_blob_service_client_sas(account,raw_sas_token)
bronze_bsc = get_blob_service_client_sas(account,bronze_sas_token)

def _prepare_paths_for_data_processing (account: str, raw_container: str, bronze_container: str, folder: str, file_name: str):

    #abfss://raw@sqlday2023.dfs.core.windows.net/customer/part-00000-tid-3200334632332214470-9b4dec79-7e2e-495d-8657-3b5457ed3753-108-1-c000.csv
    #abfss://bronze@sqlday2023.dfs.core.windows.net/AWorks


    account_for_abfss = account.split('://')[-1].replace("blob","dfs")
        
    path_to_blob_raw = "abfss://" + raw_container + "@" + account_for_abfss+"/"+ folder +"/"+file_name
    path_to_blob_bronze = "abfss://" + bronze_container + "@" + account_for_abfss+"/"+ folder
    return account_for_abfss, path_to_blob_raw, path_to_blob_bronze
folders = ["customer","orders"]

for folder in folders:
    full_path_raw = account + "/" + raw_container 
    full_path_bronze = account + "/" + bronze_container + "/" + folder

    raw_container_client = _get_container_client(raw_bsc, full_path_raw, raw_sas_token)
    bronze_container_client = _get_container_client(raw_bsc,full_path_bronze, bronze_sas_token )

    blob_list = raw_container_client.list_blobs(name_starts_with=folder) 


    for item in blob_list:
        blob = os.path.basename(item.name )

        account_for_abfss, path_to_blob_raw, path_to_blob_bronze = _prepare_paths_for_data_processing(account, raw_container, bronze_container, folder, blob)

        if 'csv' in path_to_blob_raw:
            print (path_to_blob_raw)        
            df = spark.read.load(path_to_blob_raw, format='csv', header=True)
            df.write.mode("append").parquet(path_to_blob_bronze)
